mapper.select: SELECT sys_menu.id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.label, sys_menu.title, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.router_path, sys_menu.component_path, sys_menu.component_name, sys_menu.perms, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.link_path, sys_menu.query, CASE sys_menu.no_cache WHEN '0' THEN TRUE WHEN '1' THEN FALSE END AS no_cache, CASE sys_menu.skip WHEN '0' THEN TRUE WHEN '1' THEN FALSE END AS skip FROM sys_menu INNER JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_role_menu.menu_id = sys_menu.id INNER JOIN sys_role ON sys_role.id = sys_role_menu.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.id WHERE sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} AND sys_menu.status = '0' AND sys_menu.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY sys_menu.sort DESC
